question.questionText: Explain why you got a voltage reading of 0 for terminal 4 and the positive terminal.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: Terminal 4 and the positive terminal are connected
Terminal 4 and the positive terminal are not separated by the gap
There is no gap between terminal 4 and the positive terminal
terminal 4 is not connected to the negative battery terminal
terminal 4 is separated by a gap from the negative battery terminal
Terminal 4 and the positive battery terminal are in the same electrical state

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: there is no gap between terminal 4 and the positive terminal
there is a gap between the positive battery terminal and terminal 4.
the terminal is conntected to postive end of battery
the terminals are blocked by a gap
there is no difference in the two terminals. they are in a closed path
BECAUSE IT WAS ATTACHED TO THE NEGATIVE TERMINAL.
terminal 4 is connected only to the positive battery terminal
the positive battery terminal is connected in circuit with terminal 4
terminal 4 is not connected to the negative terminal because of a gap in bulb b.
The positive battery terminal was not separated by a gap from terminal 4.
